name: DASH SPORT
description:
Made in Unreal Engine 4, DASH SPORT is an unusual arcade FPS in which the player is always on air and moves only by dash and machine-gun fire!


Make split-second decisions as you fight to survive in an arena surrounded by deadly lasers and ever more crowded with enemies as a bloodthirsty crowd cheers for the Dash Sport!

Use the walls and pillars of the arena to support your dashes and gain an edge on the enemies!


-------

CONTROLS:

Mouse - LOOK AROUND

Left Mouse Button -SHOOT

Right Mouse Button - DASH

Shift + Mouse movement - Roll character

-------

Dash Sport v 1.0.0.0 was developed by myself in roughly two-weeks as a school project for the Game Engine class were I had my first contact with Unreal Engine.  I'm proud of the final result and I also enjoyed experimenting with the game's unusual movement and getting a grip around Unreal Engine.

So now I'll keep working on it as a personal project,  further exploring the possibilities of new challenges that may be developed around these movement mechanics,  building up the game's aesthetics and improving its presentation and game feel. 

------

Dash Sport is a game in development, bugs and oddities are bound to occur.

If you notice any of them, please take some time and submit a bug report! It helps a lot! Thanks!

------

You can contact me and follow the Dash Sport's development on twitter at @beier_breyer :)

Cheers and thanks for playing,

- Bernardo Beier Breyer M.
